p: Carotenoids were isolated from chickpea sprouts oil following the protocol described by [ 42], using 0.5 mL of chickpea sprouts oil dissolved in 5 mL hexane and vortexed for 30 s with 0.25 mL of 0.5% NaCl. Supernatants were obtained after centrifugation for 10 min at 1500 g and measured at 453 nm (Thermo scientific, Madison, WI, USA). Total carotenoids were expressed as Î²-carotene equivalents.
